Title: Logan's War: Bound by Honor

Released: 1998
Length: 01:31:07
Size: 889MB
Genre: Action, Crime, Drama, Martial Arts

Plot: When Logan (Eddie Cibrian) a young boy witnesses his family's execution at the direction of a Chicago mobster he vows to avenge their death. He is the only one to witness the brutal murders but remains silent when questioned by the F.B.I. For his safety Logan is moved to Uncle Jake's (Chuck Norris) Texas ranch. Being raised by an Army Ranger, war hero and martial
arts expert Logan models himself after his uncle and joins the Rangers. After the army Logan keeps true to his promise and finds work as an enforcer for the same mob that killed his family in a plot to destroy their organization.


Starring: Chuck Norris, Eddie Cibrian, James Gammon, R.D. Call, Jeff Kober and Joe Spano.
